mapper.sql: ADMS_NO, GRP_LEVEL, ITEM_CODE_GRP, ITEM_CODE, UP_GRP_CODE, UP_CODE, SEL_GRP_CODE, CHN_YN, LAST_YN, MDT_YN, MULTI_YN, UPLOAD_YN, SEND_CNT, ORGN_SEND_YN, TMPLT_YN, CHK_CND, MSG_NO, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from MDT_ADMS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into MDT_ADMS (ADMS_NO, GRP_LEVEL, ITEM_CODE_GRP, ITEM_CODE, UP_GRP_CODE, UP_CODE, SEL_GRP_CODE, CHN_YN, LAST_YN, MDT_YN, MULTI_YN, UPLOAD_YN, SEND_CNT, ORGN_SEND_YN, TMPLT_YN, CHK_CND, MSG_NO, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) values (#{admsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grpLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemCodeGrp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upGrpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selGrpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdtYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{multiYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgnSendYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmpltYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkCnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

update MDT_ADMS
ADMS_NO = #{record.admsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRP_LEVEL = #{record.grpLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
